offers & deals

MEMORIES

Gallery

#travelnow

We take the stress off your shoulders as we work with an absolute commitment to fulfilling your travel dreams.

EMMYE TRAVELS
5.0
Based on 144 reviews
review us on
Degen Siri
08:49 22 Aug 23
They are reliable and fast .. I was surprised how they delivered more than they promised. Their services are top notch. I recommend Emmye Travels any day, any time.
OBINNA OKOROGU
13:32 15 Aug 23
I have been flying/travelling since the past decade.I got so fed up with stories from agencies and airlines to the point that I resorted to booking my tickets myself.Recently, my wife needed to travel to South Africa for a professional exams and if you're acquainted with South Africa in recent times, you will know its rocket science getting South Africa visa. I reached out to emmye travels with Hope in my heart and he asked me for her documents. I submitted same and 6weeks later, he sent her visa to me. By the 3rd week of waiting for the visa, I became apprehensive if she was gonna be denied but he assured me that the visa would come out(The assurance in his voice is out of this world). By the 5th week, The only hope I was holding on to was the assurance from emmye travels based on their past success stories. Just this morning, he sent me the visa.Not just ensuring the visa came out, he looked for the best flights at very affordable rates and booked for my wife. Did I also mention that he assisted with the yellow fever card for my wife? Emmye travels is actually a 'one stop shop' when it comes to migration and immigration matters and I would recommend him anytime anyday!If you are like me that have very horrible experiences with travel agencies, I can assure you with my whole being that Emmye travels would change your perception for Good! Think migration, flight tickets, visa application and anything that has to do with immigration ? Then think Emmye travels!They have my unrestricted Recommedations!Dr Okorogu obinna
Crown Godwin
11:16 02 Feb 23
Very friendly and honest
SOLOMON DEBORAH
13:25 23 Sep 22
Osaretin “Dachoice” Giegbefumwen
14:49 29 Jun 22
Deborah Aigbata
20:58 04 Apr 21
Emmye Travels offers trusted, quality and reliable travel services, providing their clients with the necessary traveling documents. Their services are top notch, they deliver exactly what is expected, provides necessary assistance that enable the clients travel happily without hitches, and ensure they follow up their clients till they get to their destinations. They provide their clients with 24hours international passport, process visas for tourism, employment and residency and book flight tickets for local and international travelers. One of the best international travel agency in Benin city, Nigeria. You will surely be glad you did business with them.
Ugochukwu Ogbonnaya
07:48 20 Mar 21
If there's any travel agency I'll recommend to anyone, it's got to be EMMYE TRAVELS. It's a travel agency that can be trusted. I love how they put customer satisfaction above every other thing.It can be difficult to trust travel agencies, but I can tell you that by choosing EMMYE TRAVELS, you'll see a high level of integrity and sincerity.EMMYE TRAVELS is the last travel agency you'll need to work with, because they'll deliver just what you desire (if it is within their scope of operation) and you won't need to look for another travel agency.Travel with EMMYE TRAVELS and you'll be glad you did.
Abhulimen Caleb
14:24 19 Mar 21
Every time I have travelled with Emmye Travels on an Ultimate holiday, it has always been tremendous. The experts you deal with really know their areas and give best advice. They tailor things to meet your needs and the whole package is professionally put together. All parts of our trips worked well and there were no problems at all. They created a great experience every time I have used them.
Faith Elliora
13:23 19 Mar 21
One unique thing to note and enjoy at Emmye travels is great customer service and the commitment to delivering top quality services. You get what you want and extra value for your money.The agents are very detailed in covering every aspect of your travel plans and documentation.

EMMYE TRAVELS

Top Floor, 254A, Uselu-Lagos road, beside Ecobank, Ugbowo, Benin City, Edo State.


+2347031356395

 

Connect
Facebook-f Instagram Whatsapp Youtube
